DataElement.preferredDefinition: The qualitative description of medical imaging.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure._A characteristic of an image that measures its perceived quality, especially as compared to an ideal or perfect image.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: A characteristic of an image that measures its perceived quality, especially as compared to an ideal or perfect image.

Concepts.definition: A characteristic of an image that measures its perceived quality, especially as compared to an ideal or perfect image.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released. AK 2020-6-12 Created for CDISC aligned NCI Standard CRF task. ghd

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicates quality of a biomedical image that is of acceptable quality, with no technical defect likely to impair using the image for diagnosis or for intended purposes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.: Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.: Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.

Concepts.definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a biomedical image that is of best quality, most adequate for diagnostic purposes or for publication.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a biomedical image that is of best quality, most adequate for diagnostic purposes or for publication.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a biomedical image that is of acceptable quality, with some technical defect but still adequate for diagnostic purposes.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a biomedical image that is of acceptable quality, with some technical defect but still adequate for diagnostic purposes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.:Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
